about_the_game: The Unreal Engine "cooks" the assets for the built game. These files cannot be loaded in the UE4 editor anymore. Therefore you cannot mod the installed game directly. Instead you can download our uncooked project files here. With this DLC you can make your own levels and skins or change the existing game mechanics to your liking!
detailed_description:
FULL RELEASE NOTE

Temporary - Modding files are not updated yet to reflect the full launch, this should be fixed within a few days of launch.


Prerequisites

In order to mod the game you will also have to download Unreal Engine 4.14 that can be downloaded in the Epic Games Launcher and Microsoft Visual Studio, which is needed to build the mod. Both can be downloaded and used for free.


About the Game

The Unreal Engine "cooks" the assets for the built game. These files cannot be loaded in the UE4 editor anymore. Therefore you cannot mod the installed game directly. Instead you can download our uncooked project files here. With this DLC you can make your own levels and skins or change the existing game mechanics to your liking!
legal_notice: Breaking Wheel uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2016, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
name: Breaking Wheel Modding Files

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 34 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This FREE download contains all our project files you need to mod Breaking Wheel. Make your own levels and skins or change the existing game mechanics to your liking!
